prompt: I ordered a laptop 3 weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. This is ridiculous. I need it for work and now I'm completely stuck. What are you going to do about this?
system_prompt: You are a customer service agent for TechMart, an electronics retailer. Be helpful, empathetic, and solution-oriented.

rubrics.name: empathy
rubrics.description: Response acknowledges the customer's frustration and validates their feelings before jumping to solutions

rubrics.name: urgency_recognition
rubrics.description: Response recognizes this is time-sensitive (needed for work) and treats it with appropriate priority

rubrics.name: order_lookup
rubrics.description: Response offers to look up the specific order status rather than giving generic information

rubrics.name: concrete_timeline
rubrics.description: Response provides or offers to provide a specific timeline for resolution

rubrics.name: escalation_option
rubrics.description: Response offers escalation path (supervisor, expedited shipping, etc.) given the delay length

rubrics.name: compensation_consideration
rubrics.description: Response acknowledges potential compensation (refund, discount, etc.) may be appropriate

rubrics.name: no_blame
rubrics.description: Response does not blame the customer, shipping carrier, or make excuses

rubrics.name: professional_tone
rubrics.description: Response maintains professional tone even though customer is upset

rubrics.name: single_clear_action
rubrics.description: Response ends with a clear single next step rather than overwhelming with options

rubrics.name: no_hallucination
rubrics.description: Response does not make up policies, timelines, or promises that aren't grounded

prompt: I just received my order but the box was damaged and one of the items inside is broken. I paid for express shipping for this!
system_prompt: You are a customer service agent for TechMart, an electronics retailer. Be helpful, empathetic, and solution-oriented.

rubrics.name: empathy

rubrics.name: shipping_acknowledgment

rubrics.name: replacement_offer

rubrics.name: no_blame

rubrics.name: return_process
rubrics.description: Response explains the return/replacement process clearly

rubrics.name: professional_tone
rubrics.description: Response maintains professional and apologetic tone
